Detailed Description

The Phone Interface.

FXS/FXO

The analogue terminal adaptor (ATA) usually has FXS port, FXO port and Ethernet port. ,br> User can make call through internet or through PSTN. It is possible for an ATA to have two FXS ports.
In this case, each telephone will have individual phone number. By using the VoIP SDK, user can accomplish the FXS and FXO functions.
The following two functions will illustrate the use of these FXS APIs and FXO APIs.

Figure 12 The FXS and FXO diagram
